description: Unique identifier for a measurement record for a person.
comment: Primary Key for the MEASUREMENT table.

description: Unique identifier for the person associated with the measurement.
Standard concept mapped from the source value representing a measurement.
Date of the measurement (e.g., closest to sample draw date).
Datetime of the measurement. Convention is to set time to midnight if unavailable.
Time of the measurement (backwards compatibility, deprecated in future versions).
Concept ID representing the provenance of the measurement record (e.g., EHR, claims).
Concept ID representing the operator (e.g., =, >, <) for the measurement value.
comment: Foreign Key: CONCEPT.concept_id (Meas Value Operator domain).

description: Numerical value of the measurement result.
Concept ID representing the categorical result of the measurement.
Concept ID representing the unit of the measurement.
Low reference range for the measurement.
comment: Lower limit of normal range for the measurement.

description: High reference range for the measurement.
comment: Upper limit of normal range for the measurement.

description: Provider associated with the measurement record.
Visit during which the measurement occurred.
Visit Detail during which the measurement occurred.
Verbatim value from the source data representing the measurement.
Concept ID representing the measurement source value, not necessarily standard.
Verbatim value from the source data representing the unit of measurement.
comment: Source-provided unit value for the measurement.

description: Concept ID representing the unit source value, not necessarily standard.
Verbatim result value of the measurement from the source data.
comment: Source-provided result value for the measurement.

description: Primary key of the linked record related to the measurement, if applicable.
Concept ID identifying the table and field the linked record belongs to.
